author: Romashkoo
Fixator10
install_msg:
Thanks for install.
Don't forget to set api key (`[p]forecastapi`)
If you don't have registered DarkSky API key, this cog will be useless to you.
DarkSky API closing at end of ~~2021~~ 2022 and im aware of this.
description: Weather forecast. Requires "semi-private" DarkSky API key. For more info: https://blog.darksky.net
end_user_data_statement:
This cog may store data about user's preferred measuring units.
This data can be remove by either via `[p]forecastunits reset` or via data removal request.
